short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick shortcut to add tasks to Things inside Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A lightweight chrome extension designed to effortlessly integrate your Gmail and Things workflow. With a quick click or keyboard shortcut add tasks directly to your Things inbox right inside your Gmail web app. 

This is particularly beneficial for non-Mac users, such as those working on office computers, as well as individuals unable to install the Things app on their computer. Don't let platform limitations hinder your efficiencyâ€”empower yourself with this simple, user-friendly solution.
